description: Mint a Wasted Wild NFT and plant a tree in the physical world. Restore the wild by protecting endangered species and habitats. So far We have planted 17000 trees with the Capsule Vault community. Capsule Vault team proudly presents Wasted Wild, a collection of 2000 imaginary beings. While every single Wildling is unique and meticulously designed NFT; You, the pioneers in the Wild, will not only own the highly detailed artworks and full commercial rights to these assets, but also be granted access to enter the Capsule Vault Metaverse along with your Wildings in the future!
mint: Mint Wildlings - {{price}} ETH per token, {{maxNumTokens}} max per tx.
